title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: J. Greenstein 11 yrs.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Alternating rectangles of house on a hill in pink, blue, and green on white ground or yellow, pink, and green on white ground and cluster of flowers in blue, yellow, pink, and green. Alternation of two rectangular scenes: one, a house on a hill against a blue or yellow sky; the other, plants growing in a garden.
